description: A new directive regarding animal registration hasn't been welcomed warmly. Media point out that according to the law even if you have one chick in a garden, you've got to register it and if you eat it - deregister. And it's not the only absurd related to the new law.

options.description: Let's amend the law by exempting breeding for personal use from the obligation.
And that's what it was about. There's no need to change anything

title: The animal register absurd
